thread.title: Sunny Pawar at Oscars 2017: Sunny Pawar roars like 'The Lion King' at Oscars
thread.title_full: Sunny Pawar at Oscars 2017: Sunny Pawar roars like 'The Lion King' at Oscars

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sunny Pawar at Oscars 2017: Sunny Pawar roars like 'The Lion King' at Oscars
text:
Eight-year-old Indian actor Sunny Pawar and Jimmy Kimmel , the host of the 89th Academy Awards ceremony, re-enacted the scene from the popular animated film 'The Lion King' here. Kimmel went up to the 'Lion' actor, who has built a strong fan base for playing the child version of Saroo Brierley in the Dev Patel-starrer, and asked if he had watched the 1994 film 'The Lion King'.
Dev Patel arrives at Oscars 2017 with his mom! This is the first time that the actor has been nominated for the big trophy!
Sunny said, " Yes ". After agreeing to reenact the scene which featured baby Simba and his father Mufasa, Kimmel and Sunny recreated it in front of Hollywood stars like Nicole Kidman, Matt Damon , Denzel Washington and Emma Stone here on Sunday.
Kimmel lifted Sunny, dressed in a tuxedo, up in the air. This is not in the first time that Sunny has attended an award ceremony in the West. He also stole the show at the 2017 Golden Globes red carpet in January.
'Lion', set in India and Australia, bagged six nominations this year at the Oscars.
Jimmy Kimmel previews hosting Academy Awards 02:03
